items: Amoxicillin: common side effects include nausea and rash.
Take amoxicillin exactly as prescribed by your pharmacist or doctor.
See a doctor urgently if you have the worst headache of your life, fever with stiff neck, or a new neurological symptom.
Most coughs improve with rest, fluids, and over-the-counter remedies. Seek urgent care for severe headache, fever with stiff neck, or a new neurological symptom.
Amoxicillin is a commonly used antibiotic for bacterial infections. It is not effective for colds or flu.
